about.title: About NR-GEO
about.heading: Slovak Construction Intelligence
about.description: NR-GEO is a leading engineering surveying company specializing in underground construction, tunneling, and precision geodesy. With extensive experience of our team, we deliver world-class solutions for Europe's most demanding projects.
about.missionText: To provide precise, reliable geodetic support for critical infrastructure with emphasis on sustainable practices and European quality standards.
about.precisionExcellenceText: Precise surveying with certified geodetic equipment and licensed professionals according to project requirements.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for modern underground construction
services.ctaTitle: Ready to modernize your infrastructure project?
services.ctaDescription: From traditional surveying to cutting-edge digital twins and sustainable supply chains - we deliver comprehensive solutions.

tunneling.title: Tunneling & Underground Surveying
tunneling.description: Specialized surveying services for tunnel excavation and tunnel lining using DRILL & BLAST methods.
tunneling.overview: Specialized surveying services for underground construction.
capabilities: Guidance of tunnel excavation using D & B method
tunneling.experience: 150+ km of tunnels surveyed across Scandinavia, Alps, and Balkans

scanToBim.title: 3D Scanning
scanToBim.description: Cutting-edge laser scanning technology for material optimization and infrastructure lifecycle management.
scanToBim.overview: State-of-the-art 3D reality capture transformed into intelligent BIM models. Material optimization technology that reduces concrete usage by up to 15% through precise as-built modeling.
scanToBim.experience: Pioneering digital twins for Nordic infrastructure projects since 2024

geotechnical.title: Geotechnical Monitoring
geotechnical.description: Automated sensor systems for real-time stability monitoring, deformation warning systems, and risk analysis.
geotechnical.overview: Automated real-time monitoring systems for ground movement, structural stability, and safety-critical deformation analysis. 24/7 alert systems for early warning.
geotechnical.experience: Monitoring critical infrastructure across 12 European countries

markets.title: Our Markets
markets.subtitle: Operating where Europe's future is being built
markets.globalDescription: NR-GEO delivers precision engineering worldwide - from Scandinavian megaprojects to Balkan Corridor VIII and Ukraine's reconstruction.
markets.globalFootnote: We work globally, no matter where your project is located

scandinavia.title: Scandinavia
scandinavia.description: Active projects in Sweden and Norway including major transport infrastructure.

balkans.title: Balkans - Corridor VIII
balkans.description: Strategic transit projects connecting Eastern and Western Europe.

ukraine.title: Ukraine - Reconstruction
ukraine.description: Partnership in rebuilding critical infrastructure with emphasis on sustainable materials.

worldwide.title: Worldwide Projects
worldwide.description: We accept projects globally - wherever precision engineering is needed, we deliver excellence.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the experts behind our precision engineering

forbifart.title: Förbifart Stockholm
forbifart.description: 21 km Stockholm bypass - one of Europe's largest transport projects.
forbifart.overview: Förbifart Stockholm is one of Europe's largest infrastructure projects - a 21 km bypass route with 18 km of tunnel beneath the Swedish capital. NR-GEO provided comprehensive surveying and monitoring services throughout the entire construction phase.
scope: TBM guidance for 4 tunnel boring machines
Continuous deformation monitoring of existing infrastructure
Underground control network establishment and maintenance
Real-time positioning for excavation equipment
As-built documentation and quality control
Coordination with Swedish Transport Administration
achievements: Zero incidents related to surveying precision
Maintained millimeter accuracy over 21 km route
Successfully monitored 200+ buildings above tunnel route
Delivered all milestones on schedule

jarfalla.title: Järfällatunnel 4713
jarfalla.description: Critical section of Stockholm bypass requiring precision underground surveying.
jarfalla.overview: Järfällatunnel 4713 is a critical section of the Stockholm bypass system, requiring precision underground surveying and mining geodesy expertise. NR-GEO provided comprehensive measurement services for tunnel excavation and structural monitoring.
scope: Underground control network for tunnel construction
Mining surveying and geological documentation
Laser scanning of tunnel profiles and as-built conditions
Deformation monitoring during excavation
Real-time data processing and reporting
Integration with main Förbifart Stockholm project
achievements: Maintained sub-centimeter accuracy in challenging geology
Successfully documented complex rock formations
Provided 24/7 surveying support during critical phases
Established new standards for tunnel profile documentation

tvr.title: TVR E05 Korsvägen
tvr.description: Advanced tunnel surveying for Gothenburg's major transport infrastructure project.
tvr.overview: TVR E05 Korsvägen is a critical component of Gothenburg's public transport expansion, connecting major city districts through underground infrastructure. NR-GEO provided comprehensive tunnel surveying and monitoring services for this technically demanding urban project.
scope: Urban tunnel surveying in densely populated area
Integration with existing metro infrastructure
Real-time monitoring of sensitive buildings
Precision alignment for metro tunnel excavation
Deformation analysis and risk assessment
Coordination with city planning authorities
achievements: Zero service disruption to existing metro operations
Maintained millimeter precision in urban environment
Successfully navigated complex underground utilities
Delivered comprehensive as-built documentation

hammarby.title: Hammarby Sjöstad 7714
hammarby.description: Stockholm's first underwater metro station - precision surveying beneath Hammarby Canal.
hammarby.overview: The Hammarby Sjöstad metro extension is part of Stockholm's ambitious Blue Line expansion project. This groundbreaking project includes Hammarby Kanal station, Stockholm's first metro station built in rock beneath water, requiring advanced surveying techniques for underwater construction. The project includes sophisticated tunneling work with TBM operations and precision alignment in challenging aquatic conditions.
scope: Underground control network for metro tunnel construction
TBM guidance for underwater tunnel sections
Deformation monitoring of canal structures during excavation
Precision surveying beneath water level
As-built documentation for rock cavern station
Integration with Blue Line extension to Nacka
achievements: Successfully delivered surveying for Stockholm's first underwater metro station
Maintained millimeter precision in challenging aquatic environment
Zero incidents during canal proximity operations
Pioneered new surveying techniques for underwater station construction

osloK2C.title: Oslo K2C Metro Extension
osloK2C.description: High-precision surveying for Oslo's critical metro infrastructure expansion.
osloK2C.overview: The K2C project is part of Oslo's extensive metro and railway infrastructure development, supporting the city's growing transportation needs. NR-GEO provided comprehensive surveying services for tunnel construction, station development, and integration with existing infrastructure in Norway's capital region.
scope: Precision surveying for metro tunnel excavation
Underground control network establishment
TBM guidance and monitoring
Deformation monitoring of existing structures
Integration with Oslo's existing metro network
Real-time data processing and quality control
achievements: Maintained sub-centimeter accuracy throughout project
Successful integration with operational metro system
Zero disruptions to existing metro services
Delivered all milestones on schedule

prahaMetroD.title: Praha Metro D
prahaMetroD.description: Prague's fourth metro line - 10.6 km with 10 stations, featuring driverless train technology.
prahaMetroD.overview: Metro Line D is Prague's newest and most technologically advanced metro line, spanning 10.6 kilometers with 10 stations connecting Náměstí Míru and Depo Písnice. This flagship infrastructure project features fully automated driverless trains and represents the future of Prague's public transportation. NR-GEO provides precision surveying services for this complex underground construction project, ensuring millimeter accuracy for tunnel alignment and station construction.
scope: High-precision tunnel alignment surveying for 10.6 km route
Underground control networks for 10 station locations
TBM guidance and breakthrough precision planning
Deformation monitoring of historical city structures
As-built documentation for automated train systems
Integration with existing Metro lines (transfer at Pankrác)
achievements: Contributing to Prague's largest metro expansion project
Supporting construction of first driverless metro line in Czech Republic
Precision surveying for complex urban tunneling conditions
Successful monitoring in historic city center environment
prahaMetroD.clientName: Dopravní podnik hl. m. Prahy (Prague Public Transit Company)

impressum.title: Impressum
impressum.subtitle: Legal Information & Privacy Policy
impressum.dataCollectionText: NR-GEO s.r.o. is committed to protecting your privacy. We collect and process personal data only to the extent necessary for providing our services and in accordance with applicable data protection laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
dataWeCollect: Contact information (name, email, phone number) when you submit inquiries through our contact form
Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information) for website functionality and security
Project-related information when you engage our services
dataUsage: To respond to your inquiries and provide requested services
To improve our website and user experience
rights: Request correction or deletion of your data
Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority
impressum.dataProtectionContact: For questions about data protection, please contact us at
impressum.cookiePolicyIntro: This website uses cookies to enhance user experience and analyze website traffic.
impressum.essentialCookiesDesc: Required for basic website functionality, including language preferences and session management. These cookies cannot be disabled.
impressum.analyticsCookiesDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website to improve user experience. You can opt-out of these cookies.
impressum.cookieControl: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.
impressum.disclaimerText1: The content of this website has been compiled with meticulous care and to the best of our knowledge. However, NR-GEO s.r.o. cannot assume any liability for the up-to-dateness, completeness, or accuracy of the pages and information provided.
impressum.disclaimerText2: NR-GEO s.r.o. is not responsible for the content of external links. The operators of the linked pages are solely responsible for their content.
impressum.disclaimerText3: All information provided on this website is for general informational purposes only and does not constitute professional advice. For specific project requirements, please contact us directly.
impressum.copyrightDesc: All content, images, logos, and trademarks on this website are the property of NR-GEO s.r.o. or their respective owners. Reproduction, distribution, or commercial use without prior written permission is prohibited.
